name: M. Night Shyamalan: The Last Airbender - Nintendo Wii
shortDescription: Harness the power of Air and Fire as you join a quest for honor and power
longDescription: You creep farther into the damp cave, following the direction of the slick wall. You haven't seen light in hours and are starting to worry you will never escape this maze of dripping water and rancid smells. It would be easy to succumb to despair in your current circumstances, but you press on. Once a Prince of the mighty Fire Nation, you find yourself not just in reduced circumstances but constantly fighting for your life. Harness the powers of Air and Fire in a fight for your elemental rights and the throne of your father's beloved land.  The Last Airbender follows the latest imaginings of master storyteller M. Night Shyamalan as he unravels a tale of magic and mystery. Following the climax of the movie of the same name, this game allows you to take the place of Zuko, his Ninja alter-ego Blue Spirit or the Avatar, Aang, as they embark on an epic journey. Control your environment with an innovative telekinesis system and Aang's abilities to produce Air Vortexes and Tornados with his awesome Airbending powers. Manipulate your enemies with stealth maneuvers, smoke bombs and unique weapons when you play the Blue Spirit or use Firebending bombs, blasts and more when you harness the powers of Zuko. As you travel through underground caves and cities exclusive to the game, you'll need all of these amazing abilities to defeat enemies and succeed. The powers of the environment are at your back, but do you have what it takes to defend the honor of your father and kingdom?

name: Sony - God of War Collection Greatest Hits with DualShock 3 Wireless Controller for PS3
shortDescription: Experience Kratos' world in a new way
longDescription: SynopsisReturn to the dark world of ancient Greece determined to exact your revenge on an uncaring deity. The God of War Collection combines the first two titles in this epic series, God of War and God of War II, on one disc, with each game remastered in brilliant high definition. Feel your wrath rise as you become the brutal warrior Kratos, and stop at nothing to bring down the God of War and turn the tide of fate.  This God of War Collection Greatest Hits Ultimate Combo Pack includes God of War and God of War II on one Blu-ray Disc and a red DualShock 3 wireless controller. Enter a dark and forbidding mythological world in the remastered God of War Collection. See the relentless action blaze across your screen at a fluid 60 frames per second, and watch the ancient world come alive in breathtaking detail with precise 720p resolution. The red DualShock 3 wireless controller puts the intensity of this epic story in the palm of your hand. Highly sensitive SIXAXIS motion-sensing technology responds to your movements with lightning-quick speed, giving you the response you need to complete the adventure. Savor the intensity of this violent and forbidding tale of conquest and destiny as you strive to ascend Olympus and destroy a god.

name: Sony - LittleBigPlanet Greatest Hits with DualShock 3 Wireless Controller for PS3
shortDescription: Create and share your own unique worlds with this exciting combo pack
longDescription: SynopsisTravel to a world where the only limit on what you can do is your own imagination. In LittleBigPlanet, the world is yours to create and to share. From the uniquely styled and customizable SackBoy to awe-inspiring tools that give you the power to build your own one-of-a-kind levels, LittleBigPlanet invites you to draw on your own imagination to design amazing creations that thrill, inspire and challenge.  In LittleBigPlanet, next-generation gaming ascends to a new level with a game that not only engages you with a variety of thrilling and challenging levels, but also inspires you to create your own. Customize your SackBoy character to reflect your personality, then play your way through more than 50 awe-inspiring levels. Along the way, you'll be able to collect more than 500 objects that you can use to create your own dazzling and imaginative worlds. You can even share your levels with others online so they can experience the joys of playing through a world of your creation. This exciting Game of the Year Edition comes packed with even more content designed to fuel your imagination, including 18 new bonus levels designed by LittleBigPlanet community members and bonus costume and level packs, including the Metal Gear Solid level pack. The black DualShock 3 wireless controller puts the excitement and fun of this world in your hands. Highly sensitive SIXAXIS motion-sensing technology responds to your movements with lightning-quick speed, giving you the response you need to complete your humorous adventure.

name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior - Xbox 360
shortDescription: Control the power of death as you ghost through the jungle
longDescription: SynopsisYour hands steady as you lock onto your target, the scope trained on this unsuspecting man's temple. Your breathing slows as time seems to wait for the fatal moment when you squeeze the trigger. Your aim is sure, your resolve unwavering; the man crumples to the ground before you even hear the shot. You claim yet another clean kill without an ounce of remorse as you reload and scan for the next target. When these men overthrew the democratic government of Isla Trueno, they had no idea of the consequences. Their fate is sealed; but will your covert efforts be enough to overthrow a ruthless despot? Walk through the jungles of South America as the silent and invisible hand of death. By the time your enemies learn of your presence it's already too late — you are a Ghost Warrior.  Sniper: Ghost Warrior takes you on a thrilling journey as you influence the tide of government from the shadows. Your enemy won't see it coming as you work with a spotter, slow your breathing and calculate for the effects of weather and distance falloff. You have an arsenal of weapons at your disposal, but usually one bullet is all you need. Watch as you take your targets out with precision in Bullet Cam mode, or engage in real-time assault sections. The action never ends with plenty of different play opportunities including sniper vs. sniper, real-time tactical assault and fixed machine gun combat scenarios.

name: Sony - PlayStation 3 (250GB) with Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
shortDescription: Find new levels of fun with PlayStation 3 and Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
longDescription: SynopsisHang on for an exciting multimedia experience with PlayStation 3. Featuring a high-definition Blu-ray Disc player, Uncharted 2: Among Thieves, a 250GB HDD, a DualShock 3 wireless controller, free PlayStation Network membership and more, you'll be ready to head out for new horizons and amazing possibilities. The slimmer, lighter system provides all the versatile gaming and entertainment features you've come to expect from PlayStation 3 in a more compact form factor designed to fit more easily into your home entertainment center. Enjoy the immersive thrills of high-definition gaming and movies that burst off the screen in crystal-clear 1080p resolution, and benefit from the massive storage capacity of the expansive 250GB hard drive, providing plenty of room to store games, videos, photos and downloaded content from the PlayStation Network. PlayStation 3's built-in Blu-ray Disc player and Wi-Fi capability expand your entertainment possibilities. With five times the storage capacity of standard DVDs, Blu-ray Discs deliver incredibly realistic and immersive gameplay that pulls you right into the heart of the action. The innovative Blu-ray Disc player is compatible with CDs and DVDs, so you can enjoy your existing music and movie library with PlayStation 3's 1080p output via HDMI. Elevate your gaming and do so much more than ever before with the PlayStation 3.  Return to a shadowy and dangerous world filled with mercenaries and criminals in Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. As fortune hunter Nathan Drake, you'll embark on a perilous journey in search of the truth behind the lost fleet of Marco Polo and the legendary Himalayan valley of Shambhala. Make your stand aggressively against the dangers that dwell in the mountains, or take a stealth approach to combat courtesy of the game's open layout. See the game world come to life with a bold, cinematic presentation, complete with free-flowing "traversal gunplay" that adds a unique vertical element to standard third-person shooting mechanics. Compete or cooperate with other players in exciting multiplayer gameplay as you seize your courage and prepare to risk everything in a deadly pursuit.
